description:
Access and manage your CRM data seamlessly with 100+ tools in our HubSpot MCP implementation including manipulation of Contacts, Companies, and Associations.

Follow the steps here to get a free Developer API Key (save as HUBSPOT_ACCESS_TOKEN): https://developers.hubspot.com/docs/guides/api/overview

HUBSPOT_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: HUBSPOT_ACCESS_TOKEN - Your HubSpot API access token

tools.name: crm_create_company
tools.description: Create a new company with validated properties

tools.name: crm_update_company
tools.description: Update an existing company with validated properties

tools.name: crm_get_company
tools.description: Get a single company by ID with specific properties and associations

tools.name: crm_search_companies
tools.description: Search companies with company-specific filters

tools.name: crm_batch_create_companies
tools.description: Create multiple companies in a single request

tools.name: crm_batch_update_companies
tools.description: Update multiple companies in a single request

tools.name: crm_get_company_properties
tools.description: Get all properties for companies

tools.name: crm_create_company_property
tools.description: Create a new company property

tools.name: crm_list_objects
tools.description: List CRM objects of a specific type with optional filtering and pagination

tools.name: crm_get_object
tools.description: Get a single CRM object by ID

tools.name: crm_create_object
tools.description: Create a new CRM object

tools.name: crm_update_object
tools.description: Update an existing CRM object

tools.name: crm_archive_object
tools.description: Archive (delete) a CRM object

tools.name: crm_search_objects
tools.description: Search CRM objects using filters

tools.name: crm_batch_create_objects
tools.description: Create multiple CRM objects in a single request

tools.name: crm_batch_read_objects
tools.description: Create multiple CRM objects in a single request

tools.name: crm_batch_update_objects
tools.description: Update multiple CRM objects in a single request

tools.name: crm_batch_archive_objects
tools.description: Archive (delete) multiple CRM objects in a single request

tools.name: crm_list_association_types
tools.description: List all available association types for a given object type pair

tools.name: crm_get_associations
tools.description: Get all associations of a specific type between objects

tools.name: crm_create_association
tools.description: Create an association between two objects

tools.name: crm_archive_association
tools.description: Archive (delete) an association between two objects

tools.name: crm_batch_create_associations
tools.description: Create multiple associations in a single request

tools.name: crm_batch_archive_associations
tools.description: Archive (delete) multiple associations in a single request

tools.name: products_list
tools.description: Read a page of products. Control what is returned via the `properties` query param. `after` is the paging cursor token of the last successfully read resource will be returned as the `paging.next.after` JSON property of a paged response containing more results.

tools.name: products_read
tools.description: Read an Object identified by ID

tools.name: products_create
tools.description: Create a product with the given properties and return a copy of the object, including the ID.

tools.name: products_update
tools.description: Perform a partial update of an Object identified by ID. Read-only and non-existent properties will result in an error. Properties values can be cleared by passing an empty string.

tools.name: products_archive
tools.description: Move an Object identified by ID to the recycling bin.

tools.name: products_search
tools.description: Search products

tools.name: products_batch_archive
tools.description: Archive (delete) a batch of products by ID

tools.name: products_batch_create
tools.description: Create a batch of products

tools.name: products_batch_read
tools.description: Read a batch of products by internal ID, or unique property values. Retrieve records by the `idProperty` parameter to retrieve records by a custom unique value property.

tools.name: products_batch_update
tools.description: Update a batch of products by internal ID, or unique values specified by the `idProperty` query param.
